title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Small and Medium Enterprises project(SME)

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Small and Medium Enterprises project(SME)) is a component of Small and Medium Enterprises project(SME) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,128,075. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Trade policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 01-07-2005 and the end date is 30-03-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
